name: Hair of the Wolf
description:
You are Red, a young girl who is on her way to her grandmother's house. Sounds familiar, right? Well, things take a turn for the worse when she realizes she is being hunted by all sorts of creatures trying to kill her. With a helpful wolf at her side, she ventures through the forest in hopes reaching her grandmother, unaware that the forest will tempt her along the way...

Controls:

Movement: WASD/Arrows

Attack: Aim with mouse and left click (hold and release to make Red's knives fly further)

Switch character: Q

Interact: E
